about_the_game:
The Farming Frontier is an almost idle farming simulator where you can cut wood, mine, fish, grow crops, bake bread, and breed cattle freely. However, it also loosely follows a storyline where you need to use your farming skills to fight your enemies.



In this world, everything is connected. To fight your enemies, you need to train soldiers. Soldiers require weapons and a strong economy to sustain the fight. As the farmer, you're responsible for maintaining the economy.



Firstly, you need wood. Chop trees and employ a woodcutter to convert logs into wood for constructing buildings. Some buildings may require stones, so you must quarry rocks and process them into building materials. Build a fishery, bakery, and mill to produce food for your population.



Your peasants need comfortable homes to rest and eat when tired and hungry. Provide these houses with food. Learn crafting to produce items faster and more efficiently.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU, 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU, 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported

short_description: The Farming Frontier is a slow-paced real-time strategy farming RPG with a riveting story. Grow crops, breed cattle, go fishing, learn crafting, and defeat your enemies.
